My Projects

Virtual Pet

May 31, 2019

I collaborated with my team to develop this game called Virtual Pet. We created a database which would allow us to store all of our pets. We wrote the program in Java. We used version and source control to keep track of progress in the project, and we also used Test Driven Development(TDD) to insure our code worked properly.

Jun 3, 2019

This project was for a hospital database. I collaborated with another developer to create this project. We wrote the program in Java. We used version and source control and to keep track of progress in the project, and we also used Test Driven Development(TDD) to insure our code worked properly.
